docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: create post
docs.text: This is my first blog post using mkdocs-material..

docs.title: give it a metadata
docs.text:
date: is a mandatory header

---
  date: yyyy-mm-dd
---

additional metadata to improve experience

docs.title: references
docs.text: original guide to create post using mkdocs-material

docs.title: push repo using ssh
docs.text:
git remote add origin git@github.com:SirECMG/elton-blog.git
git branch -M main
git push -u origin main
